languages.text: "Для таких, как ты, и самая искренняя молитва будет отравой".
"For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."
languages.original_text: "Для таких, как ты, и самая искренняя молитва будет отравой".

traits.locale_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."
"For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."
"For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."
"For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."

languages.text: “对你这样的人而言，最真诚的祈祷就是毒药。”
languages.original_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."

traits.locale_text: “对你这样的人而言，最真诚的祈祷就是毒药。”

languages.text: «Para los seres como tú, las plegarias sinceras son veneno».
languages.original_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."

traits.locale_text: «Para los seres como tú, las plegarias sinceras son veneno».

languages.text: 「お前のような者にとって、誠実なる祈りは毒のようなものだろう」
languages.original_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のような者にとって、誠実なる祈りは毒のようなものだろう」

languages.text: "Für jemanden wie Euch wäre selbst das aufrichtigste Gebet Gift."
languages.original_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."

traits.locale_text: "Für jemanden wie Euch wäre selbst das aufrichtigste Gebet Gift."

languages.text: « Pour ceux de votre espèce, même la prière la plus sincère n'est rien de plus que du poison. »
languages.original_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."

traits.locale_text: « Pour ceux de votre espèce, même la prière la plus sincère n'est rien de plus que du poison. »

languages.text: "Senin gibi birinin kulağına en içten dualar bile zehir gibi gelir."
languages.original_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."

traits.locale_text: "Senin gibi birinin kulağına en içten dualar bile zehir gibi gelir."

languages.original_text: "For ones such as you, the most sincere prayer would be poison."
